title: Retry failed production build/deployment and capture actionable error output

requirements.text: Re-run the full production build and promotion/deployment flow again (the same flow that previously failed during deployment), and ensure the process uses the existing Google Search Console meta-tag verification step so the deployment is blocked if the expected verification meta tag is missing.

If the build/deploy fails again, the exact failing step and full error output are captured and included in the build logs/artifacts so it is clear what needs to be fixed next.
If the build/deploy succeeds, the public site is updated and reachable at https://pd5nf-fqaaa-aaaan-qetaq-cai.icp0.io.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything under frontend/src/components/ui.
Respect the single-actor Motoko backend architecture (all logic in backend/main.mo); only add a migration file if a state upgrade is required.
nonGoals: No new product features or UI/UX changes beyond what is required to successfully re-run the build/deploy flow.
No backend schema changes unless they are strictly required to resolve the deployment failure.
